product.title: HESTIA APPLIANCES IQ-Egg Boiler (Beige)
feature_bullets: Hestia IQ Egg Boiler allows you to boil eggs in 3 different modes - Hard, Medium & Soft. Hestia IQ-Egg boiler has real IQ and is very easy to operate, all you need to do is put the eggs in the appliance, add appropriate quantity of water as per cup measurement and enjoy your eggs
Hestia IQ-Egg boiler comes with a one-touch operation which makes it easy to operate the appliance without any hassles
Hestia IQ-Egg boiler will turn off automatically when the eggs are boiled (Auto Dry-Off Function)
Includes BPA & BPS Free Plastics, Electric Egg boiler with base plate, Measuring Cup with Egg Piercer, Removable Egg Tray with handle, Lid Cover with Steam Vent, Stainless Steel bowl & User manual
Extended warranty: Kindly connect with us on 9321-437842 to know, how you can avail of 1 year additional warranty on the appliance

This amazing preparation nourishes the skin and helps to improve its texture. It has also been awarded as the 'Best Serum for Anti-Aging' by Vogue and ElleForest Essentials Sandalwood and Saffron Night Treatment Cream, 50gThis formula has a corrective and preventive action, retaining firmness and radiance. These intensive night treatments encapsulate high performance herbs, enzymes and hydrators to deliver vital nutrition to the skin. A unique night treatment formula which blends the pure oils of Sandalwood and Saffron to nourish Normal to Dry skin types.
